scripts.new: echo 'Enter name of new HTML file (\033[33mwithout .html\033[0m)' && read filename && cp ./docs/template.html "./docs/$filename.html" && sed -i'.backup' "s/__TEMPLATE_NAME__/$filename/g" "./docs/$filename.html" && rm "./docs/$filename.html.backup" && echo "Created \033[32m./docs/$filename.html\033[0m"
